Ed Woodward described Jurgen Klopp as a “genius” before he left Borussia Dortmund and became Liverpool’s boss.

“He’s a genius. Their wage bill is lower than half the clubs in the Premier League, but he’s really got a lot out of them.”

Klopp on rejecting United: “I had talks with other clubs and they didn’t sound like a football club.

“It sounded like marketing, image, you need to sign this, you need to sign that. And I thought ‘wow, that’s not the game I love’.”
